library.description:
SharepointPlus ($SP) is a JavaScript library which offers some extended features for Microsoft SharePoint entirely on client side (requires no server install). $SP will simplify your interactions with the Sharepoint Web Services and will help you to deal with the List Forms.

Other JavaScript library like this one are often complex, with few or no example. With SharepointPlus it's easy and you'll find examples for each method.
library.name: SharepointPlus
